K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:433b-1: a'arya ta th'a ga ta bee d'urya pra bha n'a ma ba la dha na sa m'a dhi dh'a ra ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:433b-3: 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs bskyed pa bee d'urya'i 'od ces bya ba'i gzungs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:433b-5: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:433b-6: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:433b-7: bcom ldan 'das sman gyi gnas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:433b-8: dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:433b-9: byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:433b-10: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing bskul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:433b-11: de ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu g-yos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:433b-12: lha'i tsandan gyi phye ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:433b-13: me tog gi char dpag tu med pa bab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:433b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa bdun 'khor dang bcas pa 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir gshegs te; de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs shing byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis ni bskor /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:434a-10: khyim bdag rnams kyis yongs su bskor bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:434a-11: de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:434a-12: thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:434a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgongs su gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:434a-14: sems can thams cad kyi sdig pa thams cad sbyang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:434a-15: nad thams cad bsal ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:434a-16: re ba thams cad bskang du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:434a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mtshan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:434a-19: sngon gyi smon lam gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i gzungs bshad du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:434a-20: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:434a-24: legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:434a-26: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:434a-27: de de bzhin no zhes gsol nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:434a-28: bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar nyan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:434a-29: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:434a-31: de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan legs par yongs bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:434b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa @434b rin po che dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:434b-2: padmas rab tu brgyan pa mkhas pa gzi brjid sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:434b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzang dri med rin chen snang brtul zhugs grub pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:434b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med mchog dpal gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:434b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa chos bsgrags rgya mtsho'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:434b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho mchog gi blos rnam par rol pa mngon par mkhyen pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:434b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bee d'urya'i 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:434b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa dpal sh'akya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:434b-9: bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:434b-10: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:434b-11: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:434b-12: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:434b-13: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma ltar rnam par snang byed la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:434b-14: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zla ba ltar rab tu bsil byed la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:434b-15: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:435a-1: sems dpa' chen po byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:435a-2: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:435a-3: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa brtsegs la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:435a-4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par gnon pa don yod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:435a-5: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blta na mdzes la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:435a-6: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mun pa mun nag thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:435a-7: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam pa legs par rnam par sems pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:435a-8: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhun po brtsegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:435a-9: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:435a-10: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhun po chen po'i rtse 'dzin rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo; ;'phags pa dgra bcom pa sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:435a-11: moo 'gal gyi bu chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:435a-12: dge bsnyen chen po dpal tshangs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:435a-14: rgyal po chen po bzhi la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:435a-15: klu'i dge bsnyen chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:435a-16: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bcu gnyis la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:435b-0: @435b de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi gsung dbyangs gcig gis gzungs kyi tshig 'di dag bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:435b-1: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:435b-2: na mo bha ga wa te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:435b-4: bhee sha dzyee r'a dz'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:435b-6: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:435b-12: aa te ma te p'a le p'a bam sho dha ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:435b-13: sarba p'a pam n'a sha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:435b-17: buddha kshe tra pa ri sho dha ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:435b-21: sarba aa k'a la mri tyu ni w'a ra ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:435b-28: sa ma nv'a ha rantu me /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:435b-29: sarba buddha bo dhi sa tv'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:435b-32: sarba ai tyu pa dr'a pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:435b-38: bee d'urya pra ti bh'a sa sarba p'a pam ksha yam ka ri sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:435b-39: aom bhee sha dzye bhee sha dzye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:435b-40: mah'a bhee sha dzye bhee sha dzye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:435b-42: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:435b-43: gzungs 'di bka' stsal pa'i tshe snang ba chen po byung ste sa chen po yang g-yos nas rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul ba dag snang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:435b-44: 'khor ji ltar lhags pa de dag gis kyang spos dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:435b-45: bdug pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la mchod nas legs so zhes bya ba gsol te lan bdun bskor ba byas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:435b-46: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bdun po de dag mi snang bar gyur nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:436a-0: bcom ldan 'das dpal rgyal ba sh'akya thub pas 'di @436a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:436a-3: rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:436a-6: mchod pa des gtsang mar byas te phyogs gtsang mar 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad dang ldan par byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:436a-7: sems can thams cad la mchog tu snying rje bas sa ga la bab pa'i nya nas brtsams te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:436a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sku gzugs byas la tshes brgyad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:436a-10: bco lnga la smyung bar gnas pas gzungs 'di dag bzhi bcu rtsa dgu 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:436a-12: stong phrag bzhi bcu rtsa dgur 'don cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:436a-21: ba dan rnams kyis nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du mchod pa byed na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:436a-22: de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis dgongs par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:436a-23: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis sems par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:436a-26: rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:436a-27: klu'i dge bsnyen chen po dag gis kyang yongs su skyong bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:436a-28: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyis yang dag par bsrung par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:436a-29: mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yongs su byang bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:436b-0: @436b nad thams cad kyis mi btab par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:436b-2: dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:436b-8: 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:436b-9: dgra thams cad kyi dbang du mi 'gro bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:436b-10: ci bsams pa'i bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:436b-11: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:436b-13: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:436b-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:436b-17: de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs bskyed pa bee d'urya'i 'od kyi gzungs zhes bya bar zungs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:436b-18: las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'thag cing sbyong ba zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:436b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi rnam par 'phrul pa bstan pa zhes bya bar zungs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:436b-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:436b-21: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:436b-22: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag yi rangs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:436b-23: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:436b-24: 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs bskyed pa'i bee d'urya'i 'od ces bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:437a-1: gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:437a-4: zhus chen gyi lotstsha ba bande ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:437a-5: slad kyis rgya gar gyi mkhan po d'i pam ka ra shri dzny'a na dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-008:437a-6: dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas tho lding gser khang du skad gsar bcas kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o ////
